plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location? $(PRODUCT_NAME) does not collect this data and solely uses it to show your location on a map within the app.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location? $(PRODUCT_NAME) does not collect this data and solely uses it to show your location on a map within the app.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location? $(PRODUCT_NAME) does not collect this data and solely uses it to show your location on a map within the app.

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your microphone? $(PRODUCT_NAME) does not collect this data and solely uses it for making searches instead of using the keyboard.
